name: Workshops
description: Educational sessions focused on improving specific fitness skills, techniques, or knowledge.

name: Partner Workout
description: A fun and engaging workout designed for two people, improving motivation and teamwork.

name: Outdoor Class
description: Fitness sessions conducted outdoors, incorporating natural terrain and fresh air for a refreshing workout experience.

name: Private Training
description: One-on-one coaching tailored to individual fitness goals, providing personalized attention and progress tracking.

name: Open Gym Class
description: A flexible class allowing participants to use gym equipment under trainer supervision, without a structured session.
type: Free for Members / Paid for Drop-ins

name: Semi-Private Training
description: Small-group training sessions (2-4 people) offering a balance of personal attention and group motivation.

name: Drop-In Class
description: A flexible, no-commitment class that allows participants to join on a session-by-session basis.

name: Online Class
description: Virtual fitness sessions conducted via live streaming or pre-recorded videos for remote training.

name: Group Class
description: A structured workout for multiple participants, fostering a community-driven fitness experience.
